DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Whole Cell Pellet Aliquot Barcode Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The descriptor of the aliquot of the whole cell pellet specimen collected.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Whole Cell Pellet Aliquot Barcode
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._Including all components without exception; constituting the full amount or extent or duration; complete._A cell sample collected and compacted by centrifugation of a liquid suspension._Pertaining to a portion of the whole; any one of two or more samples of something, of the same volume or weight._A machine-readable representation of information in a visual format on a surface.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.
